pull_request.title: Refactor example building test, fix standalone examples (#1555)

pullrequest.title: Refactor example building test, fix standalone examples (#1555)

content.raw:
No gazebo debs, but it's possible that my local folder is messed up in some way.

The linking error in the examples that failed is fixed by adding `gazebo_client` in `target_link_libraries` after `${GAZEBO_LIBRARIES}` in the `CMakeLists.txt`. Is `gazebo_client` supposed to be included in `${GAZEBO_LIBRARIES}`?
content.html:
No gazebo debs, but it's possible that my local folder is messed up in some way.

The linking error in the examples that failed is fixed by adding gazebo_client in target_link_libraries after ${GAZEBO_LIBRARIES} in the CMakeLists.txt. Is gazebo_client supposed to be included in ${GAZEBO_LIBRARIES}?

content.raw:
right, I have a pure CMake build installed to a local folder, I have run `make install` for Gazebo, and my environment variables look like:

```
PATH=/home/jackie/local/bin:...
LD_LIBRARY_PATH =/home/jackie/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu::/home/jackie/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/gazebo-6.0/plugins
PKG_CONFIG_PATH=PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/home/jackie/local/lib/pkgconfig:/home/jackie/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/pkgconfig
CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH =/home/jackie/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake
```

any idea what I should set so this test will pass?
content.html:
right, I have a pure CMake build installed to a local folder, I have run make install for Gazebo, and my environment variables look like:

PATH=/home/jackie/local/bin:...
LD_LIBRARY_PATH =/home/jackie/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu::/home/jackie/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/gazebo-6.0/plugins

content.raw:
What if there was a test that checks whether each subfolder is tested? This way we still explicitly say which examples are to be tested, but it also will notify us when a new example is created but not tested.

I'd like to save this for a future pull request if possible.
content.html:
What if there was a test that checks whether each subfolder is tested? This way we still explicitly say which examples are to be tested, but it also will notify us when a new example is created but not tested.

I'd like to save this for a future pull request if possible.

pull_request.title: Refactor example building test, fix standalone examples (#1555)

pullrequest.title: Refactor example building test, fix standalone examples (#1555)

content.raw: It would be cool if this test and the one below pulled the names of the examples from CMakeLists.txt or from the names of source files in the directory, so that we don't have to add the names of new examples as we add them. This would make it hard to disable testing certain examples, but since we're just testing compilation, I don't think we have to worry about exceptions.
content.html: It would be cool if this test and the one below pulled the names of the examples from CMakeLists.txt or from the names of source files in the directory, so that we don't have to add the names of new examples as we add them. This would make it hard to disable testing certain examples, but since we're just testing compilation, I don't think we have to worry about exceptions.

content.raw: Looks like `ign_math_default` is fixed. I think it's still good to have a mix of cmake `find_package` and `pkg-config` examples though. Can we leave some of these using `pkg-config` and convert the others to cmake?
content.html: Looks like ign_math_default is fixed. I think it's still good to have a mix of cmake find_package and pkg-config examples though. Can we leave some of these using pkg-config and convert the others to cmake?

update.description:
Per #1555, I refactored example_plugins.cc and example_standalone.cc into examples_build.cc so they can share the testing code. I also enabled testing of all the stand_alone examples and fixed their compilation.

Note that one of the examples is failing on OS X, but this is fixed by pull request #1642.
update.title: Refactor example building test, fix standalone examples (#1555)

pull_request.title: Refactor example building test, fix standalone examples (#1555)

pullrequest.title: Refactor example building test, fix standalone examples (#1555)

content.raw:
That pull request appears to switch most of the examples to use cmake `find_package` instead of `pkg-config`. The results aren't online anymore, but my last email summary of that branch (`ign_math_default`) showed that the `EXAMPLE_*` tests were failing on trusty.

We could switch to `find_package` if we think it's better, but I think the changes in `ign_math_default` would need to be fixed.
content.html:
That pull request appears to switch most of the examples to use cmake find_package instead of pkg-config. The results aren't online anymore, but my last email summary of that branch (ign_math_default) showed that the EXAMPLE_* tests were failing on trusty.

We could switch to find_package if we think it's better, but I think the changes in ign_math_default would need to be fixed.
